snippet: The request followed unrest at Indonesia’s consulate in Jeddah, where thousands of workers waited in the sun to get new papers and a woman died of suspected heat exhaustion.
lead_paragraph: The request followed unrest at Indonesia’s consulate in Jeddah, where thousands of workers waited in the sun to get new papers and a woman died of suspected heat exhaustion.

headline.seo: Indonesia Asks Saudi Arabia to Extend Deadline for Workers
headline.main: Indonesia Asks Saudis to Extend Deadline for Undocumented Workers
